name: InfiniTalk
description: This is a Chat Application(WhatsApp Clone) created using React js and Node js and you can chat with another user and your chats are purely encrypted.Present available in Desktop mode only

name: MovieList
description: I created this webpage using REACTJS and IMDB API. It contains all the movies and series with their total information like cast, rating, release date, etc.

name: Library Management System
description: It is a group project in which we use AngularJS for Frontend and Spring Boot for Backend. The system helps in managing library resources effectively.

name: TODO LIST
description: I created this webpage using REACTJS and NODE JS. It features User Authentication with Login and Register functionalities, allowing users to manage their to-do lists.

name: ITYUKTA 2K23
description: I created this website using REACTJS and CSS for the ITYUKTA technical fest. Students can register for events organized during the fest.

name: PORTFOLIO
description: I created this website using REACTJS and CSS for showcasing my details and projects. It serves as my personal portfolio.

name: HK FOUNDATION
description: I created this website using HTML and CSS for a donation cause. It utilizes a payment gateway through Razorpay for handling donations.

name: VIRTUAL PIANO
description: I created this website using HTML and CSS to provide a virtual piano experience with musical keys.

name: EMAIL VERIFICATION
description: I created this website using REACTJS, CSS, and EMAILJS for checking emails without backend. It helps in email verification.
